privacy_policy_intro: FitQuest ("we", "us", or "our") values your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal information when you use our workout mobile application.
privacy_policy_1a_bullets:
Name, username, or nickname
Email address
Payment information (handled via secure third-party processors)
Profile info (e.g., age, gender [optional], avatar selection)
privacy_policy_1b_bullets:
Workout activity and progress
App feature usage and frequency
Device & log info (type, IP address, OS, crash logs)
privacy_policy_1c_text: We may use cookies or similar tech, plus analytics services to improve your experience and analyze usage trends.
privacy_policy_2_bullets:
Operate and maintain the App
Personalize your experience and workout plans
Process subscription payments
Respond to support requests
Improve features and user experience
Notify you about updates, offers, and changes (marketing is optional)
privacy_policy_3_bullets:
Payment processors (e.g., Stripe, Apple, Google)
Analytics/services that help operate and analyze the app
Legal authorities if required by law or to protect rights/safety
privacy_policy_3_text: We never sell or rent your personal information.
privacy_policy_4_text: We protect your data using industry-standard security. Sensitive data (such as payments) is managed by trusted third parties.
privacy_policy_5_bullets:
You may access, update, or delete your account info via the app or by contacting us.
You can opt out of marketing emails anytime.
privacy_policy_6_text: FitQuest is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect info from under-13s. Contact us if you believe a child has used the app.
privacy_policy_7_text: We may update this Policy. We will notify users of changes through the app or by other communication.
privacy_policy_8_text:
If you have any questions, contact us at:
